name: md-scripts
description: Markdown Scripts and publishing for programming lectures and presentations by Matthias

scripts.publishHtml: npm run cleanAndGeneratePdfs && npm run clanAndGenerateHtml
scripts.clanAndGenerateHtml: rm -rf docs && reveal-md scripts/ --static docs --static-dirs=scripts/01_Programmieren_Vorlesung/img,scripts/02_SoftwareCraftsmanship/img,scripts/pdfdownloads --css scripts/_assets/style.css && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.cleanAndGeneratePdfs: rm -rf scripts/pdfdownloads/* && npm run generateLecturePdfs && npm run generateSoftwareCraftsmanshipPdfs
scripts.generateLecturePdfs: npm run pdf1semester && npm run pdf2semester && npm run pdfexkurs
scripts.generateSoftwareCraftsmanshipPdfs: npm run pdf2java && npm run pdf2junit && npm run pdf2thereader

author: Matthias Berg-Neels
